languages.text: "Вот теперь она по-настоящему пугает. Псих, умеющий прикидываться нормальным, в десять раз опаснее".
"Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Вот теперь она по-настоящему пугает. Псих, умеющий прикидываться нормальным, в десять раз опаснее".

traits.locale_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
"Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
"Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
"Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
"Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

languages.text: "Nun ist sie wirklich furchterregend. Eine Wahnsinnige, die vorgeben kann, normal zu sein, ist zehn Mal gefährlicher."
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ist sie wirklich furchterregend. Eine Wahnsinnige, die vorgeben kann, normal zu sein, ist zehn Mal gefährlicher."

languages.text: « Plus le temps passe, plus elle me fait froid dans le dos. Et pour cause, un maniaque capable de feindre la normalité est dix fois plus dangereux. »
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « Plus le temps passe, plus elle me fait froid dans le dos. Et pour cause, un maniaque capable de feindre la normalité est dix fois plus dangereux. »

languages.text: «Ahora es verdaderamente aterradora. Una maníaca capaz de fingir que es normal es diez veces más peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora es verdaderamente aterradora. Una maníaca capaz de fingir que es normal es diez veces más peligrosa».

languages.text: 「今の彼女は本当に恐ろしい。常識人のふりをする狂人は、もっとも危ない」
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「今の彼女は本当に恐ろしい。常識人のふりをする狂人は、もっとも危ない」

languages.text: “现在她可真的吓到我了。会伪装成正常人的疯子，比普通的疯子要危险十倍。”
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “现在她可真的吓到我了。会伪装成正常人的疯子，比普通的疯子要危险十倍。”

languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."

languages.text: "Artık gerçekten gözümü korkutuyor. Normal görünmeye çalışan manyağın teki, on kat daha tehlikelidir."
languages.original_text: "Now she is truly terrifying. A maniac who can pretend to be normal is ten times more dangerous."
